name: Tiki vs. the Surfers
description:
Play as Tiki, the island god, and defend your island home from invading surfers.

Use the godly powers at your disposal to keep them at bay. Send out dolphins to push them back, call on mermaids to distract them, or … UNLEASH THE WHAAAAAALE.

Contributors

Programming: Francisco Rojo, Francis Seriña

Art: Richard Aguirre, Sean Robinette

Sound: Addie Anderson
